page.title: 17POPULATION FORRES EAST
page.content: Population in our block is divided between people living in Forres and in the countryside. There are more people living in the{urban}area than in the{rural}areas. Most people live in the housing estates, namely {Forbeshill, Drumduan}and a small part of{Sanqhar.} A small minority of the people live on isolated farms. Most of the people live in{modern}houses. Those living in the{High Street}are in the{oldest}houses. The school has 293 pupils. The population of Forres has risen from {4169}in{1931}to over{9000}now and continues to rise resulting in the establishment of more housing estates. Of note in the area is the Cosmopolitan population centred on the {Findhorn Foundation.}
